tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_preferences (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name VARCHAR(255),
  audio_preference BOOLEAN,
  graphics_preference BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE player_customization (
    player_id INT,
    option_id INT,
    equipped BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_preferences(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (option_id) REFERENCES customization_options(option_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customization_options (
   customization_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   player_id UUID NOT NULL,
   theme_color VARCHAR(10),
   avatar_skin VARCHAR(20),
   FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_progress (
   progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   player_id UUID NOT NULL,
   level_id INT NOT NULL,
   completed BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
   FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (level_id) REFERENCES game_levels(level_id)
);
CREATE TABLE players (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name VARCHAR(50), player_level INT, player_score INT);
CREATE TABLE items (item_id INT PRIMARY KEY, item_name VARCHAR(50), item_type VARCHAR(20), item_rarity VARCHAR(20), item_level_requirement INT);
CREATE TABLE player_inventory (player_id INT, item_id INT, quantity INT, PRIMARY KEY(player_id, item_id));
CREATE TABLE player_stats (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, health_points INT, attack_points INT, defense_points INT, magic_points INT);
CREATE TABLE player_settings (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sound_volume INT, music_volume INT, control_type VARCHAR(20), language VARCHAR(20));
